verses.verse: Now these are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and possessed <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> toward the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, from the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>, and all the plain <S%H6160><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%>:

Sichon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and ruled <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, which is upon the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>, and from half <S%H2677><s%> Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, even unto the river <S%H5158><s%> Yabok <S%H2999><s%>, which is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>;

And from the plain <S%H6160><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinneroth <S%H3672><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%>, and unto the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the plain <S%H6160><s%>, even the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%>, the way <S%H1870><s%> to Bethjeshimoth <S%H1020><s%>; and from the south <S%H8486><s%>, under Ashdothpisgah <S%H798><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H794><s%>:

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, which was of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the giants <S%H7497><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and at Edrei <S%H154><s%>,

And reigned <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>, and in Salcah <S%H5548><s%>, and in all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and the Maachathites <S%H4602><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, the border <S%H1366><s%> of Sichon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>.

Them did Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%>: and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it for a possession <S%H3425><s%> unto the Re'uvenites <S%H7206><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>.

And these are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> which Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%>, from Baalgad <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto the mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak <S%H2510><s%>, that goeth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to Seir <S%H8165><s%>; which Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> for a possession <S%H3425><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%>;

In the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and in the valleys <S%H8219><s%>, and in the plains <S%H6160><s%>, and in the springs <S%H794><s%>, and in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and in the south country <S%H5045><s%>; the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Y'vusis <S%H2983><s%>:
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Yericho <S%H3405><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%>, which is beside <S%H6654><s%> Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hevron <S%H2275><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon <S%H5700><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer <S%H1507><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Geder <S%H1445><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Hormah <S%H2767><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Arad <S%H6166><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Adullam <S%H5725><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Tappuah <S%H8599><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Aphek <S%H663><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lasharon <S%H8289><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon <S%H4068><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimronmeron <S%H8112><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph <S%H407><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Taanach <S%H8590><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> of Karmel <S%H3760><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> in the coast <S%H5299><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> of Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>;
The king <S%H4428><s%> of Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>, one <S%H259><s%>: all the kings <S%H4428><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and one <S%H259><s%>.
